application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Walnut (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 9.00m:  Reduce back to previous and most recent reduction points (1.20m-1.50m) to ensure crown continuity. Remove major dead wood. Thin crown density by 20%-25%.  General maintenance.1 x Box Elder (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 7.00m:  Reduce back to previous and most recent reduction points approximately 1.20m-1.50m.  Thin crown density by 25%.  Remove major dead wood throughout crown. General maintenance.1 x Beech Sapling (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 4.00m: Fell to ground level.  This small tree is growing out from the main hedge and over the rear boundary of the property, growing from behind the garden shed.1 x Beech (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 8.00m:  Remove ivy as is practicable. This tree is becoming overwhelmed with ivy. General maintenance.
